title: The Bull Case for Rocketpool with Marceau & Ken Smith
description:
On today's episode, we welcome Marceau and Ken Smith, two Rocketpool community members to share everything you need to know about Rocketpool, staking, and the bull case for Rocketpool, ETH, & RPL.

------
